Shadow Star was able to regain enough control of his
fear to turn his sights on the debris.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Tyrael's mind raced as he suspected what had
> happened to the ships. 
> No, he wouldn't... Megatron wouldn't go back
> there...
> 
> Tyrael: Shadow Star, shoot those debris. The last
> thing we'd need now 
> is a breach in the hull. Naga, get me the data you
> have gathered about 
> this hole, whatever that is, on the big screen.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...>
> wrote:
> > "Oki!" said Naga while taking his seat.Just when
> he looked at the 
> > screen his face was surprised."Tyreal,there's
> somekind of black hole 
> > or somethings." he raise a lever "Shield power is
> getting 
> > higher,50%,60%,70%,80%,90%,100% the shield is now
> at maximum power!"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Shadow Star got to the cannons and targeted a
> few
> > > pieces of space debris without actually firing
> to get
> > > the feel of them.
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Naga should see the warp by now.
> > > > 
> > > > The Night Star advanced in the void of space.
> The
> > > > Tripredacus ship was 
> > > > near to the point where the two previous ships
> had
> > > > disappeared.
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael: Strikers, somewhere around here, two
> ships
> > > > were lost on 
> > > > sensors. One of them is the Predacon ship.
> Everyone
> > > > to their station. 
> > > > Shadow Star, man the cannons. Talon you get
> the
> > > > pilot's seat. Naga, 
> > > > signal anything you cath on sensors and raise
> the
> > > > shield at maximum 
> > > > available power.
